news.title: White House considering roughly 20% tariff on most imports, report says
news.summary: The Washington Post report comes a day before April 2, when President Donald Trump is set to announce his larger plans for global trade. The president is expected to announce a new policy on global trade on April 2.

news.title: TikTok creators, partners remain optimistic ahead of appâ€™s second ban deadline
news.summary: TikTok creators and firms say they believe the Chinese-owned app will remain in the U.S. They are, however, hedging their bets.

news.title: RFK Jr. is a 'conspiracy theorist' endangering lives, say analysts at Howard Lutnick's former firm
news.summary: "HHS cannot be led by an anti-vax, conspiracy theorist with inadequate training," analysts at Cantor Fitzgerald said. "HHS can't be led ... by a conspiracy theorist," they said.

news.title: OpenAI closes $40 billion funding round, largest private tech deal on record
news.summary: OpenAI announced the close of its $40 billion financing. It is the most money raised in a single round by a private tech company.

news.title: Eli Lilly sues two pharmacies making copycat Zepbound, Mounjaro
news.summary: Eli Lilly is suing Strive Pharmacy and Empower Pharmacy for compounding tirzepatide, the active ingredient in Zepbound and Mounjaro.
